mapper.select: select * from ( select A.*, rownum as rn from ( select i.i_idx, i.title, i.m_idx, m.userid, i.view_cnt, i.write_date, i.update_date, i.complete, i.show, i.ref, i.re_step, i.re_level from inquiry i join member m on i.m_idx = m.m_idx where ${searchkey} like #{keyword} order by ${order} desc) A ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from inquiry where ${searchkey} like #{keyword}

select i.i_idx, i.title, i.content, i.m_idx, m.userid, i.view_cnt, i.write_date, i.update_date, i.complete, i.show, i.ref, i.re_step, i.re_level from inquiry i join member m on i.m_idx = m.m_idx where i_idx=#{i_idx}
select m_idx from member where userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into inquiry (i_idx, m_idx, title, content, ref, re_step, re_level, show, complete) values ((select nvl(max(i_idx)+1,1) from inquiry), #{m_idx}, #{title}, #{content}, #{ref}, #{re_step}, #{re_level}, #{show}, #{complete})
